title: Plugging in X and Y
text: We must plug in $$x=1$$ and $$y=2$$. Doing this, we get $$2=1+2$$
speech: We must plug in  x is equal to 1  and  y, is equal to 2 . Doing this, we get  2, is equal to 1 plus 2

title: Determining Equality
text: $$2=1+2$$ can be simplified to $$2=3$$, which is false statement. Thus the point does not lie on the line.
speech: 2 is equal to, 1 plus 2  can be simplified to  2 is equal to 3 , which is false statement. Thus the point does not lie on the line.

, which is false statement. Thus the point does not lie on the line.
